text: Abigail Forbes (born March 10, 2001) is an American junior tennis player. Forbes won the 2019 Wimbledon Girls' Doubles title with Savannah Broadus, joining three other Americans in the finals of the juniors tournaments. On 10 August, 2019 she and Alexa Noel won the USTA Girls 18s National Championships in Doubles, earning them a wild-card entry into the main draw of the 2019 US Open. Forbes has a career high ITF junior combined ranking of 16th achieved on 14 October 2019. title: Abigail Forbes
